mapper.select: SELECT T2.USER_NICKNAME, T2.USER_EXP, T1.CONTENT, T1.REG_TIME, T1.REPLY_NO FROM tb_reply AS T1 INNER JOIN tb_user AS T2 ON T2.USER_ID = T1.REG_USER WHERE T1.use_f = 'Y' AND Quest_no = #{QuestNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_REPLY SET USE_F = 'N' WHERE reply_no = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT T4.TEST_NAME, T3.ROUND_NAME, T2.QUEST_SEQ, T1.QUEST_NO, T1.CONTENT, T1.REG_TIME FROM tb_reply AS T1 INNER JOIN tb_quest AS T2 ON T2.QUEST_NO = T1.QUEST_NO INNER JOIN tb_round AS T3 ON T3.ROUND_NO = T2.ROUND_NO INNER JOIN tb_test AS T4 ON T4.TEST_NO = T3.TEST_NO WHERE T1.REG_USER = #{userId}
